name: KFPL Iguana 1.0 Backend Tweaks for 1080p Monitors
description:
Infor Iguana back-end administration tweaks made by the Kingston Frontenac Public Library.   
This code should be easily portable to other Iguana based websites, the document domain would need to be modified to the new URL.
additional_info:
Update version 0.11
%Modified url to be by domain rather than path, there were problems with casing.  Changed to assume lower case. 

Release version 0.10

+Made selection box longer
+Rearranged viewed items to appear on the right
+Fixed menu z-index from underlapping items

Created by the Kingston Frontenac Public Library, for use with Infor's Iguana CMS product.
